mapper.select: SELECT *, plan_types.name AS plan_type_name, join_start_time.time AS start, join_end_time.time AS end, join_start_time.id AS join_start_time_id, join_end_time.id AS join_end_time_id, courts.name AS court_type_name, courts.id AS court_id FROM plans JOIN plan_types ON plans.plan_type_id = plan_types.id JOIN courts ON plans.court_type_id = courts.id JOIN time_zones AS join_start_time ON plans.start_time_id = join_start_time.id JOIN time_zones AS join_end_time ON plans.end_time_id = join_end_time.id

SELECT plans.id, plans.event_at, plans.maximum, plans.empty_maximum, plans.price, plan_types.name AS plan_type_name, courts.name AS court_type_name, join_start_time.time AS start, join_end_time.time AS end, users.name AS user_name, users.member_id, users.tel, users.user_type FROM plans JOIN plan_types ON plans.plan_type_id = plan_types.id JOIN courts ON plans.court_type_id = courts.id JOIN time_zones AS join_start_time ON plans.start_time_id = join_start_time.id JOIN time_zones AS join_end_time ON plans.end_time_id = join_end_time.id LEFT JOIN users ON plans.id = users.plan_id WHERE plans.id = #{courtTypeId}

SELECT *, plan_types.name AS plan_type_name, join_start_time.time AS start, join_end_time.time AS end, join_start_time.id AS join_start_time_id, join_end_time.id AS join_end_time_id, courts.name AS court_type_name, courts.id AS court_id FROM plans JOIN plan_types ON plans.plan_type_id = plan_types.id JOIN courts ON plans.court_type_id = courts.id JOIN time_zones AS join_start_time ON plans.start_time_id = join_start_time.id JOIN time_zones AS join_end_time ON plans.end_time_id = join_end_time.id WHERE plans.event_at = #{eventAt} AND plans.court_type_id = #{courtTypeId}
